languages.text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
The wielder gains + 10 Toughness.
Once per combat: Whenever the wielder's wounds drop below 35%, this crown regenerates <u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> wounds.

The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +<u>(3 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> wounds.

The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +<u>(3 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> wounds.

The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

languages.text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至35%以下时，装备者的生命值会恢复，等同于{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d}。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至35%以下时，此皇冠会恢复装备者的生命值，等同于<u>（3×坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。

装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降至35%以下时，装备者的生命值会恢复，等同于{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d}。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。

languages.text:
Дает + 10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
Один раз за бой: когда у персонажа остается меньше 35% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он восстанавливает {uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} здоровья.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Дает + 10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
Один раз за бой: когда у персонажа остается меньше 35% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, эта корона восстанавливает <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u> здоровья.

Дает + 10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
Один раз за бой: когда у персонажа остается меньше 35% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, эта корона восстанавливает <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН)</u> здоровья.

Дает + 10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}.
Один раз за бой: когда у персонажа остается меньше 35% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он восстанавливает {uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} здоровья.

languages.text:
使用者は+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}を得る。
各戦闘において1回：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が35%以下になると、使用者の{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d}分の体力を回復させる。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}+10
各戦闘において1回：自身の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が35%以下になると、<u>(3×TGH{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>の体力を回復させる。

使用者は+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}を得る。
各戦闘において1回：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が35%以下になると、使用者の{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d}分の体力を回復させる。

languages.text:
El portador gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Una vez por combate: cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan por debajo del 35 %, el portador recupera +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} heridas.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
El portador gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Una vez por combate: cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan por debajo del 35 %, esta corona le regenera <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES)</u> heridas.

El portador gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Una vez por combate: cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan por debajo del 35 %, el portador recupera +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} heridas.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.
Hat der Träger weniger als 35% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, erhält er einmal pro Kampf +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} Wunden.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.
Einmal pro Kampf, wenn des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} unter 35 % fallen, regeneriert diese Krone <u>(3 × ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> Wunden.

Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.
Einmal pro Kampf, wenn des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} unter 35 % fallen, erhält der Träger +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} Wunden.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur passe sous la barre des 35 %, celui-ci bénéficie de +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} blessures.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de + 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}.
Une fois par combat : lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur passe sous la barre des 35 %, cette couronne régénère <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de RES)</u> blessures.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur passe sous la barre des 35 %, celui-ci bénéficie de +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} blessures.
